com.optimizely.ab.notification

Class NotificationListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.optimizely.ab.notification.NotificationListener
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivateNotificationListener, TrackNotificationListener

    public abstract class NotificationListener
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for Optimizely notification listeners.

    We use an abstract class here instead of an interface for convenience of use and backwards compatibility in the future. An interface would force consumers to implement every method defined on it as well as update their application code with new method implementations every time new methods are added to the interface in the SDK. An abstract classes allows consumers to override just the methods they need.

      • onEventTracked

        @Deprecated
public void onEventTracked(@Nonnull
                                        java.lang.String eventKey,

                                        java.lang.String userId,

                                        @CheckForNull
                                        java.lang.Long eventValue,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        LogEvent logEvent)
        Deprecated. 
        Listener that is called after an event is tracked.
        Parameters:
        eventKey - the key of the tracked event
        userId - the ID of the user
        attributes - a map of attributes about the event
        eventValue - an integer to be aggregated for the event
        logEvent - the log event sent to the event dispatcher

        Deprecated. 
        Listener that is called after an experiment has been activated.
        Parameters:
        experiment - the activated experiment
        userId - the id of the user
        attributes - a map of attributes about the user
        variation - the key of the variation that was bucketed

      • notify

        public abstract void notify(java.lang.Object... args)
        This is the new method of notification. Implementation classes such as ActivateNotificationListener will implement this call and provide another method with the correct parameters Notify called when a notification is triggered via the NotificationCenter
        Parameters:
        args - - variable argument list based on the type of notification.
